tablas: [MATERIAL] workstation [MODELO] 30GS000PSP [PROVEEDOR] Lenovo [TABLA] ['BEST: BETTER. 5Y Lenovo Protect (Premier Support + ADP + KYD + International Upg) (5PS1D67032): 5Y Lenovo Support (Premier Support + KYD + International Upg) (5PS1D67028).', 'BEST: GOOD. 5Y Lenovo Protect (Premier Support + ADP + KYD + International Upg) (5PS1D67032): 4Y Lenovo Support (Premier Support + KYD + International Upg) (5PS1D67027).']
resumenes: [TABLA] Modelo 30GS000PSP de Lenovo es una workstation. Este modelo incluye soporte técnico avanzado con varias opciones de servicio. Las especificaciones de soporte incluyen dos opciones principales: una con 5 años de Lenovo Protect (Premier Support + ADP + KYD + International Upgrade) y otra con 5 años de Lenovo Support (Premier Support + KYD + International Upgrade). Otra opción ofrece 5 años de Lenovo Protect (Premier Support + ADP + KYD + International Upgrade) con 4 años de Lenovo Support (Premier Support + KYD + International Upgrade).
texto: PERFORMANCE Processor Intel Core™ i7-13700, 16C (8P + 8E) / 24T, Max Turbo up to 5.2GHz, P-core 2.1 / 5.1GHz, E-core 1.5 / 4.1GHz, 30MB Processor Sockets 1x FCLGA1700 Integrated Graphics Integrated Intel UHD Graphics 770 Discrete Graphics 1x NVIDIA RTX A2000 12GB Chipset Intel W680 Chipset Memory 2x 16GB UDIMM DDR5-4800 Non-ECC Memory Slots 4 DDR5 DIMM slots, 2 channels capable Max Memory[1] Up to 128GB (4x 32GB DDR5 UDIMM) M.2 SSD RAID Controller Integrated NVMe Controller M.2 SSD Drive 1x 1TB SSD M.2 2280 PCIe 4.0x4 Performance NVMe Opal HDD Controller Onboard Intel RSTe SATA RAID Storage Support[2] Up to five drives (4x HDD + 1x M.2 SSD) or six drives (3x HDD + 3x M.2 SSD) [LISTA] 3.5" HDD up to 6TB each [LISTA] 2.5" HDD up to 1TB each [LISTA] M.2 SSD up to 4TB or 2TB each (see Storage Type) Audio Chip High Definition (HD) Audio, Realtek ALC897Q-CG codec Power Supply 500W Platinum Fixed DESIGN Keyboard USB Traditional Keyboard, Black, Spanish Mouse USB Calliope Mouse, Black Expansion Slots Supports four PCIe slots with two PCIe 4.0 x16 and two PCIe 3.0 x1. [LISTA] Slot 1: PCIe 4.0 x16, full height, full length, 75W, doublewidth [LISTA] Slot 2: PCIe 3.0 x1, full height, half length, 25W [LISTA] Slot 3: PCIe 4.0 x16 (x4 lanes), full height, half length, 25W, double-width [LISTA] Slot 4: PCIe 3.0 x1, full height, half length, 25W M.2 Slots Up to 3x M.2 SSD: [LISTA] 2 via onboard slot, can't be available when 4th HDD is selected [LISTA] 1 via Single M.2 to PCIe adapter [LISTA] One M.2 slot (for WLAN) [LISTA] Bays Up to four disk bays: [LISTA] Bay 1 supports one 3.5" / 2.5" HDD, standard [LISTA] Bay 2 supports one 3.5" / 2.5" HDD, optional [LISTA] Bay 3 supports one 3.5" / 2.5" HDD, optional [LISTA] Bay 4 supports one 3.5" / 2.5" HDD, optional [LISTA] Front Access HDD Bay supports one 3.5" / 2.5" HDD, optional, occupies Bay 3 location Dimensions (WxDxH)[3] 180 x 370 x 415 mm (7.09 x 14.57 x 16.34 inches) Weight[4] 13.61 kg (30.0. lbs, maximum configuration) CONNECTIVITY Onboard Ethernet Intel I219-LM, 1x GbE RJ-45 Card Reader SD Card Reader Front Ports 1x USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 (support data transfer) [LISTA] 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1 [LISTA] 2x USB 3.2 Gen 2 [LISTA] 1x headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm) [LISTA] 1x microphone (3.5mm) [LISTA] Rear Ports[5] 4x USB 3.2 Gen 1 (one supports Smart Power On) [LISTA] 1x HDMI 2.1 TMDS [LISTA] 2x DisplayPort™ 1.4 [LISTA] 1x Ethernet (RJ-45) [LISTA] 1x line-out (3.5mm) [LISTA] Advanced technical support, 24x7x365, in more than 100 markets Technical Account Managers for proactive relationship and escalation management Comprehensive hardware & OEM software support Priority on service delivery and repair parts Single point of contact for simplified end-to-end case management Lenovo Service Connect Portal for customized reporting and product support Accidental Damage Protection - Protection of your PC from the unexpected. Warranty Extensions & Upgrades - Service and protection that’s right for your circumstances. Pick Up & Return Courier ■ Onsite Support ■ Technician Installed Customer ■ Replaceable Unit Service ■ International Warranty Upgrade ■
